infoMessages.heading: Description
infoMessages.content:
Datasets provided on this page are available as prepackaged national downloads. They are produced and periodically updated by EPA using state-submitted data.  
  
You may need additional software to view some of the links on this page. See [EPAâ€™s Free Viewers and Readers page](https://www.epa.gov/home/free-viewers-and-readers-read-and-print-epa-information "external").
